export default function App(){const[isAuthenticated,setIsAuthenticated]=useState(!!sessionStorage.getItem('isAuthenticated'));const configError=[process.env.REACT_APP_FIREBASE_API_KEY,process.env.REACT_APP_GAS_WEB_APP_URL,process.env.REACT_APP_GOOGLE_MAPS_API_KEY].some(key=>!key)?"One or more critical environment variables (Firebase, GAS URL, Maps API) are not set.":null;if(configError){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ConfigErrorDisplay,{error:configError});}if(!isAuthenticated){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LoginForm,{onLogin:()=>setIsAuthenticated(true)});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CrmApplication,{onLogout:()=>{sessionStorage.removeItem('isAuthenticated');setIsAuthenticated(false);}});}
